name: matsu
title: Matsu
description: Monitor your Matsu data and alerts from Raycast
author: giraphant

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Menu Bar Monitor
commands.description: Display selected monitors in menu bar

preferences.name: menuBarMonitors
preferences.title: Menu Bar Monitors
preferences.description: Comma-separated monitor IDs to display in menu bar (e.g., monitor1,monitor2)

preferences.name: menuBarDisplayMode
preferences.title: Display Mode
preferences.description: How to display monitors in the menu bar

preferences.name: menuBarRefreshInterval
preferences.title: Refresh Interval
preferences.description: How often to refresh the menu bar

commands.name: list-monitors
commands.title: Monitors
commands.description: View all monitoring items and their latest values

commands.name: view-alerts
commands.title: Alerts
commands.description: View active alerts and threshold breaches

preferences.name: apiUrl
preferences.title: API URL
preferences.description: Your Matsu backend API URL (e.g., http://localhost:8000 or https://your-domain.com)

preferences.name: monitorOrder
preferences.title: Custom Monitor Order
preferences.description: Comma-separated monitor IDs to define custom sort order (e.g., monitor1,monitor2,monitor3). Monitors not listed will appear after in alphabetical order.
